entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
